ygData.subject: Re: AE spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Neil Try to cast it on your tank or any other person. Without beiing in combat if both of you are -pvp the person you cast on will not take any dmg. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Neil Try to cast it on your tank or any other person. Without beiing in
combat if both of you are -pvp the person you cast on will not take any dmg.

-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 24, 1999 3:59 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] AE spells


>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>>
>
>I Have never experienced -PvP players getting hurt from my AE spells. As a
>matter of fact I target the tanks when launching them. I know if I'm close
>enough I will take damage, but I have never seen -PvP person taking damage.
I
>think if we could damage -PvP players this would definitely be considered a
>bug, as we could kill PC's without fear of retribution. So if it is
happening
>with a spell be sure to /bug it.
>
>Malkin
>
